sentences.en: " Come up hither, Hester, thou and Little Pearl,'said the Reverend Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.cn: “ 上这儿来吧, 海丝特, 你,还有小珠儿, ” 可敬的丁梅斯代尔先生说.
“ 海丝特, ” 他说, “ 过来呀!

sentences.en: " Leap across the brook, naughty child, and run hither!
sentences.cn: “ 跳过小溪来, 顽皮的孩子, 跑过来!

sentences.en: " Thanks be to Him who hath led me hither " answered the minister. "
sentences.cn: " 感谢上帝指引我来到了这里! " 牧师回答说.

sentences.en: A school of tiny, glittering fish flicked hither and thither.
sentences.cn: 一群小小的 、 闪闪发光的鱼儿东游西窜、忽隐忽现.

sentences.en: Coloured fish darted hither and thither (= backwards and forwards ) .
sentences.cn: 五彩斑斓的鱼游来游去。

sentences.en: He has sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people.
sentences.cn: 他委派大批的官员到这里骚扰我们的人民。

sentences.en: He wandered hither and thither about the king's lonely palace.
sentences.cn: 他在国王冷清的宫殿里四处徘徊.

sentences.en: He wandered hither and thither looking for a playmate.
looked hither and thither for the ring; ran hither and yon.
Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentences.cn: 难民们四处逃奔，寻求安全之所。

sentences.en: Tell me, then, what thou art, and who sent thee hither? "
sentences.cn: 是推把你打发到这儿来的? ”

sentences.en: The mystic token alighted on the hither verge of the stream.
sentences.cn: 那神秘的标志落在离小溪不远的地方.

sentences.en: Then my last illness seized me, and I returned hither to die.
sentences.cn: 后来,致命的疾病缠住了我, 我回到这里已奄奄待毙.

sentences.en: Why , then, had he come hither?
sentences.cn: 既然如此, 他为什么还要到这里来 呢 ?

sentences.en: Why, with such rank in the learned world, had he come hither?
sentences.cn: 他既然在学术界地位如此之高,为什么要到这里来 呢 ?

phrases.phrase: hither and thither (also hither and yon)
hither and thither 或 hither and yon
